channel.title: Joyce Jordan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Joyce Jordan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: UCanDoIT, digital literacy training
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan JJ - Joyce Jordan MM I am joined by Joyce Jordan. Joyce is one of the tutors for UCanDoIT. Now first off Joyce, what is UCanDoIT? JJ Well UCanDoIT is a charity which provides computer and internet training for people in their own homes, and we teach them on a one to one basis. The charity was founded in 1998 and we have a network of tutors around the UK.
